widget.title: Desktop
widget.p: Desktop is the root pane, it contains panels (that together fill the available space on desktop), dialogs (centered), combolists, popupmenus, and tooltips. You can add only components and dialogs to desktop, the last will be on the top.

parameters.parameter: name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component
